name: The Chosen One: A Typical RPG
name_original: The Chosen One: A Typical RPG
description:
The Chosen One: A Typical RPG  follows the story of Bill, an everyday farmhand with a legendary destiny. He must embark on a long journey to defeat the Dark Lord- Sounds familiar, right? There's only one problem...

Bill refuses.

He has no desire to go on an adventure, but the gears of fate has already started turning. This RPG is a parody of a typical "Chosen One" story, with a heavy emphasis on humor. It's my first game ever made with RPG Maker, and I had originally intended for it to be much, much bigger. Despite that, I hope you give this game a try, enjoy it, and look out for more projects from me using this engine! 

(PS: If you encounter any issues with the game, leave a comment and I'll make a patch!)
